channel.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
channel.description:
Suggestions:
1) Have the vents infested with other alien species:hound eyes, zombie cut off from the stomach down and snarks
2) Scene: make the scene (where the security guard gets snatched from a zombie in a vent) more scary: make the room light more dark and play the Alfred Hitchcock theme :stuck_out_tongue:

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Coozins:

I didn’t mean direct hits. In Half-Life 2 they can get blown in half and their torso survives, what’s what I meant.

Most likely no since you can’t cut them in half, even with an minor explosion.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
Tmaned:

There was one in Route Canal in HL2. Where you first get the grenade.

Are you referring to this? (jump to 6:36)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BqTk3lokqpY
I don’t know if I’d really consider that a vent exactly…

But yeah, I myself have always wondered why you never actually saw anything else in the vents besides headcrabs and snarks. Even though there’s some “larger than normal” vents at certain points in the original.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: Tmaned
item.description:
Skaevola:

Mmmm, isn’t there a half-zombie in a vent in Ep2? I honestly could be fabricating that, but I’m pretty sure I remember something to that effect.

There was one in Route Canal in HL2. Where you first get the grenade.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: Xilefian
item.description:
DeadlyFox:

could you really see one of these: https://www.blackmesasource.com/media/bullsquid_beauty.jpg
running through vents you have to crouch in?

It sort of looks like it would stand a chance of getting it’s head in but then it’s massive legs would get stuck outside.

Once it’s head is stuck it wouldn’t be able to throw it back ready to honk up some goo to fling at freeman, it’ll be stuck head-first, dribbling in the airvent.

Maybe one time Gordon, during his travels around BMRF as a highly trained proffesional, got stuck in an air-vent and the other workers had to pull him out somehow, during the ordeal they developed a fear of entering air-vents incase of ending up nose-first against Gordon’s ass, this fear was kept when they were zombified and that explains everything.

However, one worker was ill the day Gordon got stuck in an airvent, he went on to become the zombie that drags airvent-Barney, a highly trained gymnast before being employed as a guard at BMRF, into the airvent in we got hostiles.

That wraps it all up. Case closed B)

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

But what else has enough strenth to forcefully pull 2 grown men up a wall and into the vent, then shred their corpses in seconds?

Sounds like a Bullsquid to me.

A tentacle? A barnacle? Any number of unseen horrors around the facility?

JeffMOD:

Leeerooooy Jennnnkinnsss!Couldn’t resist.

:hmph:

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: DeadlyFox
item.description:
JeffMOD:

Fox: If bullsquids can fit behind walls (Power up) then why not in vents?

Well you only see the crack in the wall and the black behind, there could be an infinite amount of space behind there. To me, they seem far too big to fit into tiny vents.

Lord Grievous:

In “We’ve Got Hostiles” a barney is pulled into a vent by a zombie. En in “Power Up” (?) a HECU is killed and pulled into a crack in the wall by a bullsquid.

Yes, like I said you see them being pulled in but not crawling around the vents, I think a whole zombie in the vent wouldn’t be a bad idea.

Edit could you really see one of these:

running through vents you have to crouch in?

It sort of looks like it would stand a chance of getting it’s head in but then it’s massive legs would get stuck outside.

Read full topic

item.title: Aliens in the vents!!!
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
DeadlyFox:

I remember in half-life seeing scientists constantly being killed by some monster pulling them into the vent and eating them but all I ever saw was just the headcrabs which was a bit disappointing. So I agree there should be perhaps zombies or something in the vent but a half zombie would be a bit weird and perhaps over the top.

In “We’ve Got Hostiles” a barney is pulled into a vent by a zombie. En in “Power Up” (?) a HECU is killed and pulled into a crack in the wall by a bullsquid.

Read full topic
